item.description:
Looking to meet other parents, and make friends for your kids, while having fun?

For Parents of Children ages birth-5!

Join us for 30 minutes of Family Style Music activities,

followed by casual "getting to know you's"!

Great music for young children and adults--no boring or annoying music here!
Relaxed class, where the only rules are to have fun and be safe!
Meet other area parents with similar interests!
Babies, toddlers, and preschoolers are all welcome!
Perfect for siblings!

group.name: The Greater Hartford Area Parents Meetup Group

item.name: Thursday Evening Musical Meet-Up!
